name: Add new CompanyHub company to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows
description: Every time a new company is created in CompanyHub, Make will automatically add that company to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ksfQDCINfXKdOeEvoDL_W2eXf_oAicnvdpnurLR5q8g/edit?usp=sharing).
